problems.title: Sum of Even Numbers in an Array
problems.description:
Problem Statement
You are given an integer N and an array A of N integers. Your task is to calculate and return the sum of all even numbers present in the array.

Input Format
First line contains a single integer N.
Second line contains N space-separated integers representing the array A.

Output Format
Print a single integer - the sum of all even elements in the array.

Example 1
Input:
6
4 7 2 8 8 5 6

Output:
20

Explanation: Even numbers are 4, 2, 8, 6 → sum = 20

Example 2
Input:
5
1 3 5 7 9

Output:
0
